original: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: āsavañca iva āsava sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto ceva nano ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: āsava sampayuttam ca iva no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca āsavavippayuttañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ceva naāsavavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: āsavam ca iva āsava sampayuttañca āsava vippayuttañca ca iva no ca āsavam ca dhammam paṭicca noāsavaḥ ca iva na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
